description: Homemade Vegan Pumpkin Bread is a favourite fall recipe packed with delicious spices, juicy chewy cranberries & crunchy pumpkin seeds. Such an easy quick-bread perfect for breakfasts or snacks!
keywords: dairy-free pumpkin bread, egg-free pumpkin bread, pumpkin bread recipe, vegan pumpkin bread, vegan pumpkin recipe
name: Vegan Pumpkin Bread
recipeIngredient: 1 3/4 cup (240 grams) flour (, all-purpose (plain in the UK), spelt, wholewheat or 1 for 1 GF all-purpose baking flour)
3/4 cup (150 grams) sugar (, coconut, brown sugar, cane or white)
1 teaspoon baking soda (, (bicarbonate of soda in the UK)
1 teaspoon ground ginger (, (or switch the 3 individual spices for 2 teaspoons of pumpkin spice)
2/3 packed cup (100 grams) dried cranberries (, or other mix-ins of choice)
1/2 cup (75 grams) pumpkin seeds (, or other mix-ins of choice)
1 slightly heaping cup (260 grams) pumpkin puree (, NOT pumpkin pie filling!)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350°F and lightly grease an 8.5 x 4.5inch or 9 x 5inch loaf pan. Lay a strip of baking parchment down the length of the pan with some overhang each side to make it easier to remove when cooked.
Add all of the dry ingredients to a large bowl and stir to combine.
Add the pumpkin puree and milk to another bowl or a jug and mix them together.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix until just combined. It is a stiff batter so do not be concerned.
Spoon the batter into the prepared tin and smooth the top with a spatula so it's level.

Bake for about 55 minutes or until golden and starting to come away from the sides of the pan. Test it by inserting a skewer, toothpick or sharp knife into the centre. If it comes out clean it's done. If not give it a few more minutes.
Remove from the tin immediately and cool on a wire rack.

video.description: This healthy Vegan Pumpkin Bread is made with wholewheat flour & is completely oil-free. It is heartily stuffed with juicy chewy cranberries & crunchy pumpkin seeds & is perfect for breakfast or snacking!
video.name: Vegan Pumpkin Bread with Cranberries & Pumpkin Seeds
